entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
